title: Accredited Continuing Medical Education Model Design Workshop: An Assessment-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in medical education planning or evaluation, with basic statistical interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Blended course combining smartphone-based mobile learning with offline workshops, emphasizing practical application through collaborative activities among learners

learning_goals: A tool can be developed to measure the effectiveness of medical education programs using an assessment design framework.
The level of educational activity evaluation can be diagnosed, and an improvement plan can be established according to a four-stage certification model.
Learner performance can be analyzed by applying mobile-friendly assessment methods in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
